name: INCREDIBLE! Stain Remover - Commercial Pack Quantity, Professional Stain Cleaner For Carpets, Fabric, Linen, Laundry, Mattress, Car Upholstery – Pet Stains, Urine, Blood, Red Wine, 16.oz, Pack of 6
short_description: The End of All Stains - Save your rug, carpet, clothes, mattress, upholstery from permanent stain damage - Incredible! Stain Remover is here to save the day. Our powerful formula eliminates various stains and odors - from coffee, wine, ink, oil, dog and cat urine, grease and more.

Easy to Use, Instant Results - Just spot and blot the stain with Incredible Stain Remover - no washing, rinsing, rubbing, or vacuuming necessary. Gone goes all traces of stain and odor - in just a few seconds, like magic.

Safe For The Whole Family - Incredible! Stain Remover is tough on stains, but safe for everybody - even children and pets. Our waterbased formula is non-toxic, non-flammable, and non-irritating unlike other harsh cleaners.

Incredible Value - With 1 bottle of Incredible! Stain Remover there's no need for a separate stain remover and odor eliminator products for carpet and your clothes. Use Incredible! Stain Remover on various surfaces, and upholstery.
Removes Old & New Stains Effortlessly – Trusted by American households for 40+ years, tackling stubborn stains like blood, ink, coffee, red wine, cosmetics, and more.

name: Spot Shot Instant Carpet Stain Remover, 16 OZ [3-PACK]
short_description: Instantly removes the toughest carpet stains without scrubbing
Safely cleans and deodorizes carpets and prevents stains from reappearing
No rubbing, scrubbing or vacuuming needed after spraying the affected area
Works on pet stains, greasy foods, motor oil, red wine, blood, grape juice, shoe polish, cola, mud, coffee, permanent marker, and lipstick stains
One Shot. No Spot.
product_description: Spot Shot Instant Carpet Stain Remover is so good that people talk about it! It is easy to use, just spray and blot. No scrubbing or vacuuming required. Spot Shot removes old and new stains and both oil-based and water-based stains. Our proprietary formula liquefies tough stain particles, allowing them to be lifted out of carpeting without rubbing, scrubbing or vacuuming. Directions: 1. Thoroughly blot or vacuum the affected area. 2. Shake can for 2-3 seconds, tilt at 60 degree angle and spray stain. 3. Blot treated stain with an absorbent cloth (preferably white). 4. Repeat steps 2 and 3 until the stain is gone. 5. Swab area with a damp cloth to remove any residue that might be left behind

name: Carpet Spot Remover, Stain and Red Wine Remover and Spot Treatment for Oil, Grease, Urine, Cleaning Performance for Rugs, Upholstery, Fabrics. Pack of 2
short_description: Removes Tough Carpet Stains – This spot carpet cleaner spray is formulated with innovative ingredients to lift away dirt, oils, and impurities from carpets and surfaces so you can maintain a cleaner home free from urine, grease, wine, soda, or pet stains.

Give Your Fabrics a Facelift – This spot carpet cleaner works all over your house to remove new or old stains to give your fabrics a clean, fresh feeling that’s noticeable, making it a must-have for homes with kids, pets, or messy spouses.

Built-In Scrubbing Cap – While many stains don’t require scrubbing at all thanks to our advanced carpet spot cleaner formula we included a flexible scrubbing lid to let you spray and scrub tough stains and get them out more quickly and easily.

Works on Water and Oil Based Spots – Offering more versatility than standard urine stain removers this spot cleaner works on loads of common problems such as blood, ink, red wine, grape or fruit juice, and other stain-causing liquids.

Carpets, Rugs, and Upholstery – Along with your living room or bedroom carpets our carpet stain remover can also be used on area rugs, runners, entryway rugs, furniture upholstery, and much more! And all with safe reliability you can trust.

name: FOLEX Instant Carpet Spot Remover 32 oz – Powerful Stain Remover for Carpets, Upholstery & Rugs – Eliminates Pet Stains, Grease, Red Wine, Food, Makeup & More – With Reusable Cleaning Cloth – 1 Pack
short_description: THE SOLUTION TO YOUR STAINS – FOLEX Instant Carpet Spot Cleaner quickly removes pet accidents, grease, oil, ink, red wine, coffee, blood, rust, food, cosmetics, dirt, and most old stains so your surfaces look clean and refreshed again.

WORKS ACROSS MANY SURFACES – It safely lifts stains from upholstery, carpets, rugs, and other water-safe, colorfast materials. The formula is water based, non-flammable, and odor free for worry-free cleaning anywhere in your home.

INSTANT RESULTS WITH NO RINSING – There is no need to rinse, vacuum, or wait to see results. Stains begin disappearing right before your eyes for fast and convenient cleaning whenever spills or accidents happen.

NO HARSH CHEMICALS OR REAPPEARING SPOTS – This non-solvent, non-magnetic formula contains no VOCs, CFCs, or petroleum so stains do not resurface after drying and you are left with a truly deep and lasting clean.
SAFE FOR FAMILY AND PETS – FOLEX is safe to use around children and pets when used as directed and leaves no harmful residue or strong chemical odors behind.
FOLEX-APPROVED CLEANING CLOTH INCLUDED – The reusable premium cloth works together with FOLEX to make stain removal easier and help you achieve streak-free, professional-quality cleaning.
MADE IN THE USA – Proudly manufactured in the United States with high-quality standards and complete ingredient transparency.
product_description: FOLEX Instant Carpet Spot Remover has removed some of the worst spots and stains imaginable. Our formula removes: pet accidents, grease, ink, red wine, coffee, blood, rust, food, cosmetics, dirt, grime, and most old stains. FOLEX Instant Carpet Spot Remover works on upholstery, carpets, and other colorfast materials that can be safely dampened with water. FEATURES INSTANT RESULTS. No rinsing, vacuuming or waiting to see results. Spots vanish before your eyes. Amazing surfactant action – instantly removes stubborn grease, dirt and grime. SAFE to use around children and pets if used as directed. WORKS on any colorfast carpets and upholstery that can be safely dampened with water. NON-MAGNETIC, spot will NOT reappear after cleaning. NON-FLAMMABLE, contains no solvents of any kind. ODOR-FREE, no unpleasant chemical smell VOCs, CFC AND PETROLEUM FREE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE USING: Test on a hidden area of the material to be cleaned by spraying on and allowing to dry. Look for color removal or color change. Use only on color stable materials. Simply apply a generous amount on the spot, gently agitate, and blot with a clean absorbent cloth. Allow carpet or material to dry before use.

name: Bissell Woolite® Advantage Pet Stain & Odor Remover + Oxy, 2-Pack, 3326
short_description: Permanent Pet Stain Removal. Triple Action Cleaning System with oxy action.
Eliminates Tough Pet Odors. Formulated with 25% more odor block technology* and leaves a fresh floral scent.
Pherobloc Technology. Discourages pets from resoiling in the same spot.
Works on Multiple Surfaces. Safe for all colorfast carpets including wool, nylon, acrylic, and stain resistant carpets and upholstery.
Removes Tough Stains. Works on old and new stains, from urine, feces, vomit, tracked-in dirt, and blood.
product_description: Permanent pet stain removal is just a spray away with Woolite® Advantage Pet Stain & Odor Remover + Oxy. This oxy stain removal formula starts working on contact to mobilize, lift and penetrate stains at the source, so they are gone for good. It works on the toughest stains our furry friends leave behind, like tracked-in dirt, urine, feces, and blood. It also works on grass stains, tomato sauce, red wine, fruit juice, makeup, food grease, coffee, soda, tea, motor oil, and more. But this formula doesn't just remove stains, it eliminates odors, too. It's formulated with 25% more odor block technology compared to our original formula. It's also safe for use on colorfast soft surfaces, including carpet, rugs and upholstery, and hard surfaces, like vinyl and linoleum. Woolite® Advantage Pet Stain & Odor Remover + Oxy is an earth friendly formula with biodegradable detergents and it doesn't contain any heavy metals, phosphates or dyes. It's also safe to use around kids and pets when used as directed. Plus, it's a Safer Choice-certified product and has been evaluated by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) through a rigorous scientific process to designate products that are safer for families, pets, workplaces, neighborhoods, and the environment.
